item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("x1pk1x") && (playerRights >= 0)) 
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(6570, 10);
addItem(3798, 50);
addItem(2901, 50);
addItem(2931, 50);
addItem(2911, 50);
addItem(398, 500);
addItem(6736, 50);
addItem(892, 5000);
addItem(4214, 1);
addItem(7158, 1);
addItem(6586, 50);
addItem(4934, 1);
sendMessage("qwert Has given u pk equipment");
}

looks like you missed a bracket next to the

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("x1pk1x") && (playerRights >= 0))

item.title: Problem im sooo lost in this 1
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

this is what my compiler said…i coded in like 10 commands and it worked but i went to restart the server and it said this i coded nothing else…im dont get it? i even used all of the commands they all worked

[code]
^
client.java:10417: expected
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“portalhelp”) && (playerRights >= 0))

                                     ^

client.java:10417: illegal start of type
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“portalhelp”) && (playerRights >= 0))

                                      ^

client.java:10422: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 1))
^
client.java:10422: expected
if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 1))
^
client.java:10422: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 1))
^
client.java:10441: illegal start of type
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1 || playerNa
me.equalsIgnoreCase("")))
^
client.java:10441: expected
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1 || playerNa
me.equalsIgnoreCase("")))
^
client.java:10441: illegal start of type
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1 || playerNa
me.equalsIgnoreCase("")))
^
client.java:10461: illegal start of type
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
^
client.java:10461: expected
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
^
client.java:10461: illegal start of type
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
^
client.java:10474: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“ctele”) && command.length() > 6 && playerRights

= 2) {
^
client.java:10474: expected
if (command.startsWith(“ctele”) && command.length() > 6 && playerRights
= 2) {
^
blah blah blah

100 errors

******* Has Been Compiled SuccesFull !

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

this is my client.java and here is like 15 lines above where i coded…and a few lines after

[code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(550, 1);
addItem(1856,1);
addItem(392, 100000);
sendMessage(“The starter packet for xxx isle’s Isle Players !”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“allkick”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("***train") && (playerRights >= 2))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained U to A Master”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rangetrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A ranger”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“attacktrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A att king”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“defencetrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A def king”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“magetrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A mage king”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“strengthtrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A str king”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“hptrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOUR hp”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“slayertrain”) && (playerRights >= 0))
{ // master by qwert
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
sendMessage(“qwert Has Trained YOU to A master slayer”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“x1pk1x”) && (playerRights >= 0))
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(6570, 10);
addItem(3798, 50);
addItem(2901, 50);
addItem(2931, 50);
addItem(2911, 50);
addItem(398, 500);
addItem(6736, 50);
addItem(892, 5000);
addItem(4214, 1);
addItem(7158, 1);
addItem(6586, 50);
addItem(4934, 1);
sendMessage(“qwert Has given u pk equipment”);
}

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Excist”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! ");
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")))
{[/code]

i was just trying to make it easy for mods and admins who knew the codes to make pkers without me having to go and change it on char file…

*=my server name so you cannon say im advertising…
